conclusion: To find the heat exchanged, analyze work done and heat transfer for each cycle segment.
Identify processes: AB isobaric expansion, BC isochoric, CD isobaric compression, DA isochoric.
Work done in isobaric process is W = P ΔV.
Work done for AB: W_AB = P1(V2 - V1).
Work done for CD: W_CD = P2(V1 - V2).
Net work done is sum of work in each process: W_net = W_AB + W_BC + W_CD + W_DA.
Since BC and DA are isochoric, W_BC = W_DA = 0.
Simplify W_net: W_net = P1V2 - P1V1 + P2V1 - P2V2.
For cyclic process, net heat added equals net work done: Q_net = ΔU + W_net.
Net heat exchanged is same as net work done: Q_net = (P1 - P2)(V2 - V1).
